column1: Thank you for your support and friendship in 2019 - it has been an honor to fight for you in Congress over the past year. My family and I wish you a happy and healthy 2020 ahead. #happynewyear2020 https://t.co/TCwuD2qKyN
Great to see my friend and former PSU stand out @mikegesicki score the game-winning TD over the @Patriots today. Congratulations Mike! #WEARE https://t.co/GxO6qzFZIB
Even @CNN admits the truth - Blair County is Trump Country. https://t.co/LKG6FuGKx0

It is an honor to have the support of these friends. All of us work together to deliver results for our constituents in southcentral Pennsylvania and I am looking forward to continuing this fight alongside them. #PA13 https://t.co/lKw4nwUc9J
On my way to Hershey with President @realDonaldTrump and looking forward to a great rally in the Keystone State. https://t.co/knhNiTN8s8
Thank you for visiting PA-13 VP @Mike_Pence! See you in Hershey. https://t.co/y6mTEcrSJL
House Democrats' #ImpeachmentHoax has always been about attacking @realDonaldTrump and overruling Americans' votes in 2016.   The American people deserve better.

From day one Democrats have been obsessed with attacking President @realDonaldTrump and avenging the 2016 election.   The people of PA-13 helped to elect @realDonaldTrump in 2016 and I will continue fighting to protect our duly and democratically-elected President.
I’m running for re-election. My fight to protect our American freedoms continues. #TeamJoyce https://t.co/W4MnV1ZAKO

Thanks to everyone who attended today’s sold out conversation with Congressman @DevinNunes in Chambersburg.   Together we’re going to keep fighting for our conservative values. https://t.co/s9eBu8EQib
.@TheDemocrats will tell you that impeachment is about the U.S. Constitution.   Their focus group-tested messaging says it's about the 2020 election. https://t.co/lToHIJnRhr
There’s never been a better time for Congressman @DevinNunes to visit Franklin County. We’re planning a productive conversation about the sham impeachment inquiry and more. https://t.co/Dda1uMsAi8
On #VeteransDay our nation honors and gives thanks for the men and women who have fought to protect our freedom at home and abroad. https://t.co/s2bNshPILp

On #ElectionDay I encourage all PA-13 voters to support the GOP candidates on your ballot who will fight to protect our conservative values and champion our commonsense priorities.  Polls are open today until 8pm. Not sure where you can vote? Check here: https://t.co/NPT3TaFE1J

Senator Warren's socialist health care plan would cost $52 TRILLION - a tremendous burden for American taxpayers. This is yet another part of Democrats' extreme agenda that Pennsylvanians don't want and can't afford. https://t.co/DwQf8X0iBD
Under @realDonaldTrump's leadership the United States is defeating ISIS and making the world a safer place. This is a great day for freedom and justice. https://t.co/up7LITfG1E

Since President Trump took office Pennsylvania has experienced record-breaking economic growth - a huge benefit for our region. Today it will be great to have @realDonaldTrump back in the Keystone State.
It’s a beautiful day in Happy Valley for @PennStateFball. Great to be back at my alma mater for homecoming. #WeAre https://t.co/ylI49pxw4W

While Democrats obsess over their politically-motivated impeachment inquiry I'm working hard to:   - Deliver a better deal for PA farmers   - Secure the southern border and #BuildTheWall   - Strengthen the economy   - Work with @realDonaldTrump to deliver on our promises

Last night it was great to join so many dedicated conservatives at the Bedford County GOP 2019 Fall Dinner. They're working hard to re-elect @realDonaldTrump and restore a Republican Majority in the House in 2020. https://t.co/9KiZC9PVFQ

Democrats have been obsessed with impeaching President Trump from day one. We won't back down from this fight. Help me defend President Trump and continue fighting for your conservative values. https://t.co/lwXt7mucqL

“Joining Pence on the stop Rep. John Joyce (R-PA-13) urged fellow members of Congress to pass the agreement. ‘We have a responsibility to pass the USMCA’ he said. ‘We have the responsibility to realize that this is going to allow jobs to continue’”  https://t.co/VqHssnz26i

The Adams County Republican Club had a strong presence at the South Mountain Fair in Biglerville. Martha O’Bryant and Cynde and Bud Vance greeted us with enthusiasm and made it clear that President Trump will once again be victorious in 2020. https://t.co/hiZpgJh4o7

We have hardworking Americans who cannot afford their care. What about them? President Trump and I are going to work together to lower health care costs for all Americans and I strongly oppose having taxpayers foot the bill for the care of those who break our immigration laws.

All of the Democrats on the stage at last night's debate raised their hands when asked if they would provide taxpayer funded health care to illegal immigrants. This is unacceptable. https://t.co/elj93UfcQ3

This is exactly why we need to reelect President Trump who I will work with to develop a market based health care plan that drives down costs for all Americans.  Expect more radical proposals from the Democrats participating in round two tonight.

Last night Elizabeth Warren raised her hand when asked if she wanted to eliminate private health insurance to implement a government takeover of health care. As a physician I know how much of a disaster this socialist policy will be. https://t.co/QEdTWOrQjg

Enjoyed watching @realDonaldTrump begin his reelection campaign this week. It has been an incredible first six months in Congress supporting his conservative agenda and I look forward to continuing to work with him and helping him win Pennsylvania in 2020. https://t.co/Yf5DxLBq5u
The best part of my Fathers Day was taking my granddaughter on a bike ride. Hoping all of the dads in #PA13 are enjoying this special Sunday. https://t.co/gi5M1FHUaw

We've seen tremendous success under President Trump due to conservative initiatives such as the tax cuts and his great Supreme Court appointments. South Central Pennsylvania is behind the President and so am I. https://t.co/TvkrkmWJ7F

In America today we celebrate all of our mothers. My mom taught me to pray study and work hard. Mothers across the nation should be commended for what they do and I wish all of them a very happy Mother’s Day. https://t.co/uLxg4unD7l

Read my @FoxNews op-ed making the case for @realDonaldTrump's 2020 victory in PA and his overall reelection and click the following link to help me continue working with him to make America great again. → https://t.co/lwXt7mucqL   https://t.co/qQfQBXOicw

While Robert Mueller’s investigation wasted 22 months worth of taxpayer resources looking into collusion that did not exist I stood by President Trump every step of the way. Click the following link and donate $22 to help me continue to stand by him. → https://t.co/lwXt7mucqL https://t.co/xAOBO1xraA
Happy St. Patrick’s Day! Alice and I had a wonderful time celebrating and marching in the Tyrone parade yesterday afternoon. https://t.co/uPzPSKmpos
It was a pleasure speaking to you this morning. Thanks for having me! https://t.co/t5unFXdMCQ
Enjoyed attending the Huntingdon County GOP Lincoln Day Dinner tonight to provide an update on what I have been doing in Congress to advance our conservative values. https://t.co/gcN8u5e6yF

After spending the afternoon in the Square in Ligonier Pennsylvania Alice and I met Father Anthony Carbone the new Pastor at Holy Trinity Parish.  Father Carbone did the  traditional blessing of the throat in honor of the feast of Saint Blaise. https://t.co/i8j364MFoh
